name: Spider Witch
description:
***WARNING: A few of the story routes in this game will involve some disturbing themes. Player discretion is advised  (｡•́︿•̀｡)***

SPIDER WITCH is a visual novel about a young witch wanting to befriend the local neighborhood kid, Jun Wu. Players can choose to play as Snow, Wilhelm, or Sage. Most of the game play is heavily dialogue based. Will you succeed in making a new friend? Go find out!!!  ヽ(・∀・)ﾉ

So far there are 6 endings you can reach, two more are being made, but development is currently paused for now because of school. 人(_ _*)

If there are any bugs, please DM me on twitter @anh_bizbunny
